content: 78 round 14 chain 1 * single_crochet 12 2 single_crochet in next stitch * 6 times slip_stitch in first single_crochet to join 84 large beds only round 15 chain 1 * single_crochet 13 2 single_crochet in next stitch * 6 times slip_stitch in first single_crochet to join 90 round 16 chain 1 * single_crochet 14 2 single_crochet in next stitch * 6 times slip_stitch in first single_crochet to join 96 round 17 chain 1 single_crochet in back loops only around the circle slip_stitch in first single_crochet to join 72 84 96 round 18 chain 1 single_crochet each stitch in both loops around the circle slip_stitch in first single_crochet to join for small beds repeat round 18 6 more times for medium beds repeat round 18 7 more times for large beds repeat round 18 8 more times fasten_off and sew in ends for firmer sides turn the bed inside out figure 2 bed shown turned inside out
